p: After purification, the H7N9 virus genes in the exosomes were detected using quantitative PCR. The exosome-enclosed viral particle is a very small part compared to the total viral particle. The H7 gene content of total viral particle and exosome-enclosed viral particle were presented in Figure 6D,E. The H7N9 amplicons were detected in samples of exosomes from both A/Zhejiang/DTID-ZJU01/2013(H7N9) or A/Guangdong/GZ8H002/2017(H7N9) infected cells ( Figure 6F). We also isolated the live virus from the exosomes ( Figure 6G). The TCID50 titre of GZ8H002 was higher than ZJU01( Figure 6H).
